page.layout:
<%
					var userLogisticsSelect = "";
					var services = ((_data || {}).shippingOption ||{}||{}).services|| {};
					var userLogisticsSelectVaule = services["SVC-USER-LOGISTICS-SELECT"];
					if (userLogisticsSelectVaule && userLogisticsSelectVaule["USER_LOGISTICS_SELECT_VALUE"]) {
						if (userLogisticsSelectVaule["USER_LOGISTICS_SELECT_VALUE"] == "CE10001") {
							userLogisticsSelect = "【务必送货上门】";
						} else if (userLogisticsSelectVaule["USER_LOGISTICS_SELECT_VALUE"] == "CE10002") {
							userLogisticsSelect = "【务必电话联系】";
						}
					}
					
				%>
                
            
                <%=_data.recipient.name%>   <%=_data.recipient.phone%>   <%=_data.recipient.mobile%>
<%=_data.recipient.address.province%><%=_data.recipient.address.city %><%=_data.recipient.address.district%><%=_data.recipient.address.town%><%=_data.recipient.address.detail%><%=userLogisticsSelect%>
            
        
		
            
                <%=_data.sender.name%>   <%=_data.sender.phone%>   <%=_data.sender.mobile%>
            
        
		<% 
          var isPrivacy = true;
          var recipientMobile = ((_data ||{}).recipient || {}).mobile || "";
          var recipientPhone = ((_data ||{}).recipient || {}).phone || "";
          if (isPrivacy) {
            if (recipientMobile.length >= 11) {
                recipientMobile = recipientMobile.slice(0,recipientMobile.length - 8) + "****" + recipientMobile.slice(-4);
            }  
            if (recipientPhone.length >= 8) {
                recipientPhone = recipientPhone.slice(0,recipientPhone.length - 8) + "****" + recipientPhone.slice(-4);
            } 
          }
          
          %>

            
                <%=_data.recipient.name%>   <%=recipientPhone%>   <%=recipientMobile%>
            
        
		
            
                <%=_data.sender.name%>   <%=_data.sender.phone%>   <%=_data.sender.mobile%>
            
        
		<%
				var sortation_name = (((_data || {}).routingInfo ||{}||{}).sortation||{}||{}).name||"";
				var route_code = ((_data || {}).routingInfo ||{}||{}).routeCode||"";
          		var datoubi;
          		if(route_code == ""){
                  datoubi=sortation_name;
                }else{
                  datoubi=route_code;
                }
			%>

            
                <%=datoubi%>
            
        
		
            
                <%=_data.routingInfo.consolidation.name%>
            
        
		
            
                <%=_data.sender.address.province%><%=_data.sender.address.city %><%=_data.sender.address.district%><%=_data.sender.address.town%><%=_data.sender.address.detail%>
            
        
		
            
                打印时间
            
        
		
            
                快件送达收件人地址，经收件人或收件人（寄件人）允许的代收人签字，视为送达。您的签字代表您已经签收此包裹，并已确认商品信息无误、包装完好、没有划痕、破损等表面质量问题。
            
        
		<barcode type="code128" style="opacity:1;hideText:false;rotation:0" value="<%=_data.waybillCode%>" ratioMode="keepRatio" />
		
            
                <%=_context.formatStartTime('HH:mm:ss')%>
            
        
		<%
           var docSeq = _context.documentNumber();
        if (typeof _context.documentCount == "function") {
          docSeq = docSeq + "/" + _context.documentCount();
        }
          %>

            
                <%= docSeq %>
            
        
		<barcode type="code128" style="opacity:1;hideText:true;rotation:0" value="<%=_data.routingInfo.consolidation.code%>" ratioMode="keepRatio" />
		<barcode type="code128" style="opacity:1;hideText:false;rotation:0" value="<%=_data.waybillCode%>" ratioMode="keepRatio" />
		
            
                <%=_data.recipient.address.province%><%=_data.recipient.address.city %><%=_data.recipient.address.district%><%=_data.recipient.address.town%><%=_data.recipient.address.detail%>
            
        
		
            
                <%=_data.sender.address.province%><%=_data.sender.address.city %><%=_data.sender.address.district %><%=_data.sender.address.town %><%=_data.sender.address.detail %>
            
        
		
            
                签收栏
            
        
		<% if(_config.needTopLogo === true){%>

		<%}%>
<% if(_config.needBottomLogo === true){%>

		<%}%>

		
		
		
		
		
		
		
		
            
                <%=_context.formatStartTime('yyyy/MM/dd')%>
            
        
		
		
        
		
                
                <%=datoubi%>-<%=_data.waybillCode%>
		<%=datoubi%>-<%=_data.waybillCode%>
		<% 
		var chengnuodaWatermark;
 		 
		 if (_data.extroInfo && _data.extroInfo.O2O && _data.extroInfo.O2O.watermark) {
			chengnuodaWatermark = _data.extroInfo.O2O.watermark;
		 } else if(_data.shippingOption.services){
		   if(_data.shippingOption.services["SVC-PROMISE-DELIVERY"]){
			   var chengnuoda = _data.shippingOption.services["SVC-PROMISE-DELIVERY"]["promise-type"];
			   if(chengnuoda == 'SAMEDAY_DELIVERY' || chengnuoda == 'NEXTDAY_DELIVERY' || chengnuoda == 'THREEDAYS_DELIVERY' || chengnuoda== 'FOURDAYS_DELIVERY' ||  chengnuoda== 'FIVEDAYS_DELIVERY' ||  chengnuoda== 'SIXDAYS_DELIVERY' ||  chengnuoda== 'SEVENDAYS_DELIVERY'){
				chengnuodaWatermark = "橙诺达";
				}
			 }
		 }
		 
		 if (chengnuodaWatermark) {
		 %>

            
                <%=chengnuodaWatermark%>
            
        
		<%}%>
<%
          var secondRouteCode;
          
          if (route_code) {
            var fixRouteCode = route_code.split(/-| /);
            
            if (fixRouteCode.length >= 2) {
          	secondRouteCode=fixRouteCode[1].substr(-3);
            }
          }
          
          if (secondRouteCode){
          %>

            
                <%=secondRouteCode%>
            
        
		<%}%>
<%			
			String.format = function(src) {
				if (arguments.length == 0) return null;
				var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 1);
				return src.replace(/\{(\d+)\}/g, function(m, i){return args[i];});
			};
			
			var Service = function(key, hasValue, format, textFormat, offset) {
				this.key = key;
				this.hasValue = hasValue;
				this.format = format;
				this.textFormat = textFormat
				this.offset = offset;
			}
			
			var Services = function () {
				this.init();
			};
			
			Services.prototype.init = function () {
				// 标准快递
				this.standserviceFormat = '\
						\
							标准快递\
						\
					';
				// 代收货款
				this.codServiceTextFormat = '代收货款：{0}';
				this.codServiceFormat = '\
						\
							\
								COD\
							\
						\
						\
							\
								代收货款\
							\
						\
					';
				// 服务相关文本
				this.serviceTextFormat = '\
						\
							\
								{2}\
							\
						\
					';
				this.servicePickupFormat = '\
						\
							\
								{1}\
							\
						\
						\
							\
								揽件码\
							\
						\
					';
				this.codService = new Service("SVC-COD", true, this.codServiceFormat, this.codServiceTextFormat, 15);
				this.serviceArray = new Array(this.codService);
				this.content = "";
				this.parse();
			}
			
			Services.prototype.parse = function () {
				var services = ((_data || {}).shippingOption ||{}||{}).services||"";
				if (services) {
					var maxLeft = 65;
					var serviceTextFormatValue = "";
					var textLineCount = 0;
					var serviceCount = 0;
					var textExtend = "backgroundColor:#000;fontColor:#fff;";
					for(var index = 0, service;service=this.serviceArray[index++];) {
						if (services[service.key] && (!service.hasValue || services[service.key]["value"])) {
							maxLeft -= service.offset;
							service.format = String.format(service.format, maxLeft, textExtend);
							textExtend = "";
							// 设置显示数据
							if (service.hasValue) {
								var serviceValue = services[service.key]["value"];
								if (serviceTextFormatValue.length > 0) {
									serviceTextFormatValue += "\r\n";
								}
								textLineCount++;
								service.textFormat = String.format(service.textFormat, serviceValue);
								serviceTextFormatValue += service.textFormat;
							}
							// 添加服务区域内容
							this.content += service.format;
							serviceCount++;
						}
					}
					
					if (0 == serviceCount) {
                      	maxLeft -= 14;
						this.content=this.standserviceFormat;
					} else {
						if (serviceTextFormatValue.length > 0) {
							var fontSizeArray = new Array(13, 8, 8);
							maxLeft -= 26;
							this.serviceTextFormat = String.format(this.serviceTextFormat, 
								maxLeft,// 服务文本区域大小
								fontSizeArray[textLineCount - 1], 
								serviceTextFormatValue);
							this.content += this.serviceTextFormat;
						}
					}
                  // 揽件码
						if (_data.pickupCode) {
							maxLeft -= 13;
							this.servicePickupFormat = String.format(this.servicePickupFormat, maxLeft, _data.pickupCode);
							this.content += this.servicePickupFormat;
						}
				}
			}
			var services = new Services();
		%>
<%=services.content%>
